name: ASUS ROG Flow X13 AMD Ryzen 7 (13.4 inch, 32GB, 1TB, Windows 11 Home, MS Office Home and Student, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti Laptop GPU, FHD+ IPS Display, Off Black, GV301RE-LJ199WS)

prod_desc.heading: Why Buy ASUS ROG Flow X13 AMD Ryzen 7
features: Windows 11 Home operating system for user-friendly performance.
1TB PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 SSD (2230) to store all your files.
AMD Ryzen 7 6800HS processor for fast performance.
32GB LPDDR5 RAM for the efficient performance of multiple software used simultaneously.
sub_features: Your efficiency levels will be on point as the ASUS ROG Flow X13 AMD Ryzen 7 features a new look loaded with so many specifications. It comes with a powerful processor along with Windows 11 Home operating system which helps you perform your regular activities with ease. The AMD Ryzen 7 6800HS Processor has set standards in computing that take your productivity, and creativity to a whole new level. It never lets you slowdown in terms of efficiency so that the quality and quantity of your work are never hampered.

The ASUS ROG Flow X13 AMD Ryzen 7 price is quite a bargain, making this an affordable buy. It ensures your efficiency levels are on point. This laptop comes with a serious storage capacity of 1TB SSD to make it more efficient and productive which lets you store all your games or work within this laptop. It is equipped with NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti Laptop GPU graphics, giving a delightful gaming feel. Experience speedy performance with advanced specifications, this laptop is one of the best laptops available in the market. The 32GB LPDDR5 RAM makes sure you can multitask between different tabs providing you with super-fast responsiveness. With the huge amount of workload and data involved in today’s world, it may get difficult at times to keep all data safe for current or future use stored due to average storage capacities. So, this gaming laptop comes with a serious storage capacity which helps you to save your content. So, what are you waiting for, go get this ASUS ROG Flow X13 AMD Ryzen 7 online, right now!

features.title: Memory
features.desc: 32GB LDDR5 RAM, 1TB PCIe 4.0 NVMe M.2 SSD

faqs.que: What is the average life of a ASUS laptop?
faqs.ans: Maintaining good habits can extend your laptop's longevity. Many users buy a laptop every couple of years (average laptop lifespan is 3–5 years)

faqs.que: How long is ASUS battery last?
faqs.ans: Under normal usage conditions and in ambient temperatures (25℃), the Li-ion battery is expected to discharge and recharge normally for 300 cycles (or about one year).

Your computer may overheat because of insufficient air flow due to dust, hair, or debris blocking the air vents. If you experience the issues of the fan is not working, the fan speed is always fast, or the fan noise is obvious loudly, please refer to the troubleshooting in this article
It isn't possible to overcharge a laptop battery. Leaving your computer plugged in after it is fully charged doesn't overcharge or damage the battery.
